reviews.review: This game deserves an extremely positive review that I cannot write right now.
세계관 탄탄한 게임 좋아한다면 추천

I wish Elizabeth was with me in all games everywhere. I played this on Fedora GNU/Linux with Nvidia 560 1920x1080 on high. Worked like a charm. Couldn't find any bugs either. So thank you from the bottom of my heart for having this for us few but brave souls on Linux. I wish the other Bioshocks had Linux support but I guess we are just too few for you guys to bother.

Anyways, great gameplay, fantastic voice acting, great story, great immersion even though I'm more of an Andrew Ryan deep sea type of person than a Comstock up in the air.

I couldn't help making connections between the rhetoric in Columbia with that of the current President of the United States which I found quite ironic and added a lot to the game for me. "Help Duke FIGHT back the Foreign Hordes" - Comstock (Trump) Cadets
The "Fight Club" of video games.
Uno de los mejores juegos de la historia. Jugabilidad buenísima, historia tremenda y pasamos de las profundidades del mar a la ciudad de los cielos. GENIALIDAD y OBLIGATORIO.
如果可以，多想一直留在，那个翩翩起舞的午后

《生化奇兵：无限》在上一作发布后六年才面世，拖延导致了游戏在一些方面的落后，这影响了商业上的成功。但是这款游戏只是套了个FPS的皮，更加接近叙事冒险和文字冒险类游戏。
    第三部把整个生化奇兵的故事串联了起来，变成一条衔尾蛇，但是这条蛇的身体有着无数的分叉，[spoiler]“]在DLC海葬二中，伊丽莎白的抉择是把一切形成一个闭环，在本体的最后中消除了布克-迪威特的存在，最终她把自己也从无尽的分支中解脱了出来。”[/spoiler]
    像《彗星来的那一夜》中的平行世界之间的细微差别：常量与变量。但是生化奇兵的世界给了更多的信息，更像一个命中注定的悲剧，伊丽莎白、布克、康姆斯托克、卢思特兄妹，都在利用别人达成自己的目的、也在被别人利用达成自己的目的。真是一个悲哀的循环。这个游戏给我的感受就是，它其实是一出戏剧，而不是用于消遣的快餐。
Концовка выворачивает мозг как пластический хирург выворачивает мошонку женщины, рожденной в теле мужчины.
Uh the game actually does end. I give it four stars out a possible 13 different commendations.

It didn't catch my attention when it came out. I finally bought it on summer sale, and finished within a week. Gotta say that this is a well designed and detailed game. This is not your regular shooter but a whole universe (Won't say more due spoilers). 

Have you ever read on 9gag about this gaming inspiring feelings? Well, it does. The game does a great job in inmersing you into this role and history.  The graphics, and by those I mean aesthetics, are good, due a superb concept art. You will find yourself just looking at those floating buildings with no reason, just to apreciate their beauty. Also, Character design is great as well, and AI companion (Elizabeth) is one of the best AI's I've ever seen. SPOILER ALERT. You simply cannot fall in love with Elizabeth. She's a well developed character, both in complexity and design, and develop during the game.

Well. This is a modern gem. I'm quite positive that this will be considered a piece of art in the future as we do now with clasic movies or art. You see, videogames are today's art, and this is a great example of a fine piece. And the truth is that this is not a surprise considering that this game's budget was more than USD 100 million. It's only with that budget that you can work on those details that make a good game great. 


History: 9/10
Graphics: 9/10
Art-Concept art: 10/10
Characters and voice acting: 9/10
Lenght: 6/10 (just around 15 hours)
Mechanigs (actual shoting): 7/10 (I didn't like the magic features. I'm a gun's guy)
Final score: 9/10

Totally worth every single penny.

Start the game and people are shooting at you for no reason
you drink magic gatorade from a candy stand that gives you magic powers that you somehow just know how to use
no story 2 hours into the game, literally just left clicking on random enemies that popup like a shooting range
Bioshock un gran juego con buena jugavilidad, sistemas de armas, mas o menos valanciado , epico y con un final muy pero muy inesterado. juegazo 10/10.

damn. first review & first story focused game.
this game is a must play. i just finished the story 1 mnute ago. damn

DO NOT PLAY THE DLCs. I REPEAT DO NOT PLAY THE DLCs.

The main game doesn't have a happy ending but it's a lot better compare to the dlcs. After finished Burial at Sea Part 1 and Part 2, my life became so gloomy. I cant move on. Even after a week my head is still thinking about the story. I fully regret until today that i have to bear the sadness. I wish i never play the dlcs.

Please live a happy and healthy life. Avoid the dlcs at all cost.

Fuck. Seriously GET OUT OF MY HEADDDD!!!!!
BEST      GAME       EVER      .
A great adventure to follow.

[h1]바이오쇼크 인피니트[/h1]

바이오쇼크 시리즈의 3번째 작품.
매우 재밌다.

해저도시 랩쳐가 배경이었던 전편들과 다르게
공중도시 컬럼비아가 배경이다.

스토리, 그래픽, 배경, 매력적인 인물들 등등
모두 완벽하다. 특히 스토리가 정말 미쳤다. 

해석을 보지 않으면 이해하기 어려울 수 있으나
이해를 하고난 후의 여운은 정말 장난아니게 오래간다.

계속 반복되는 똑같은 전투방식이 단점이지만 그걸 
탄탄한 스토리와 매력적인 배경이 보완해준다.

최고의 게임이다. 강력추천한다.

Holy hell, this game... wow.

I can't even begin to describe in words how phenomenal this game is. You just have to play for yourself. You will not regret a SECOND of it, trust me. 

Don't even expect a review from me; just buy the game. It's a masterpiece of gaming that NEEDS to be enjoyed. One of only two games to make my jaw drop. 

If you're still reading, stop. Buy the game, sale or no sale.

永远的经典
我爱傻白！

游戏用反乌托邦的方式方法来讲述了量子理论与平行宇宙，结局总是耐人寻味:“当初布克做了不同的选择，依然无法改变既定的命运吗？”

也许这是注定的……总有一座灯塔，总有一个布克，总有一个康姆斯托克，也总会有一个她。当一切回到原点时，又是否可以为这种悲惨的局面挽回？我是那么这一切根本没有发生，布克与安娜平静幸福的生活在一起。可惜命运的铁轨一路向前从不折返。

当海葬中伊丽莎白为了复仇而同时害死自己的那一刻，她终于到了巴黎。人们是那么和善，塞纳河畔的风景是那么美好，画家为美丽的她而挥笔，友善的面包师为她而奉上最新鲜的面包，孩子们喜笑颜开的跟着妈妈，白鸽在风和日丽的天空中飞翔。但当幻境消退，留下的也只有凄凉。

Sally，为了一个素不相识的小女孩，伊丽莎白几乎受尽苦难，当脑海中的布克对她说话给予鼓励时，她总能再次找到力量。即使她知道这只是脑海中的一个幻觉，一个臆想。但当她说出这句话时，却触碰到了我心里最柔软的地方：“Booker，i miss you。”那一刻她是显的那么无助，但又无比的坚强。在完成了所有的使命救出Sally之后，伊丽莎白终于倒了下来。《La Vie En Rose》的歌声响起的那一刻，我流泪了……但听着《you belong to me》，我渐渐的平静了下来。

也许…在某个裂境里，布克与安娜平静幸福的生活在了一起。父亲静静的看着自己的女儿长大，在她成为新娘时挽着她的手，在塞纳河畔埃菲尔铁塔旁，把她交给了属于她自己的真命天子，平静的笑容中写满着幸福。

[spoiler] 当初玩的太投入了，曾一度把伊丽莎白当成自己女儿……	[/spoiler]
Great game.

Basically Bioshock 3 has the same strengths and weaknesses as 1 & 2, which is to say it's very pretty and they've created a wonderful fantasy world, but they still can't make the shooty shoot stuff, the core gameplay, the reason you're there, much fun.  Best to ignore the plot too, it's the usual "definitely trying to make some dreadfully serious political point" thing, though this time round it does vanish up it's own firmament more than usual at the end.

Still, despite the many flaws, of which I'll spare you the full list, I didn't hate my time spent up in the clouds, so it just manages to scrape a thumbs up.

Hayatımda asla unutamıyacağım bir oyun. Oynarken sanki 5 dalda oscar almış bir film seyrediyor gibi hissediyorsunuz. Oyunun hikayesi gerçekten muazzam ötesi. Oyunun sonunda öylece ekrana bakakalcaksınız. Oynamadan ölmeyin. Oyun değil efsane.

Многие говорят что Undertale - это игра с "душой", но если какая-то игра и имеет "душу" так это BioShock Infinite! В первые за все пройденные игры и просмотренные фильмы мне реально запала в душу концовка! Короче нет времени объяснять я открываю врата в другой мир где я ещё не проешел эту игру!)

Sinceramente es una obra de arte. Me encuentro con otro guión  que trata sobre los multiversos ( multiuniversos), al estilo de steins; gate.

El final me dejó anonadado... Gráficamente es espectacular y su historia es brutal. Sólo juegalo y verás la eminencia de este vídeo juego.

之前只玩了一代 和幽冥城恐怖压抑的氛围不同 哥伦比亚沐浴着阳光 所有设定都充满了艺术色彩 每一幅画面都堪比一张壁纸 让人欲罢不能
伊丽莎白作为npc非常出色 可以经常与玩家产生互动 偶尔会扔钱给玩家 还会开锁（一代玩接水管游戏已经无语了）在需要的时候会扔医疗包（这代医疗包不能存 开始还不太习惯） 弹夹 而除开能给玩家实质性帮助的东西 当我们站在街上不动时 她还会好奇的观察 摆弄周围的物件 与环境产生互动 这让伊丽莎白与其他平时只会站着 变换点动作的npc产生了决定性的不同
游戏的敌人比一代来说难度小了很多 一代敌人疯子一样的乱跑 枪法还神准 这一代敌人终于正常了 而且后期敌人血也没有一代厚 一代后期全靠大老爹帮我杀人 我打一个小兵 都要耗一管血
技能方面省去了只能在固定机器上切换的麻烦 让搭配更自由 玩起来更顺畅
剧情非常出色 还能说什么呢

My oh my, where to begin...From fantastic artwork, to one of the best stories in video games since ever. I can't put into words the amazing game this is, please, do yourself a favor and just try it, you will *not* regret it. I want and could say so much but this is enough, this, this masterpiece is in all aspects, a piece of art.
Jugue los otros dos, los tres son exelentes juegos. Pero la historia de este, de verdad, me conmovio. No me esperaba tal desenlace. Gran juego en cuanto a historia, y un buen shooter.
就画面点个赞
The gameplay, the story and even the graphics. Whowww

Великолепная игра с интересным сюжетом, приятной графикой и главное с Элизабет! Рекомендую установить локализованную озвучку от CGinfo (кажется) чтобы ещё более проникнутся атмосферой города восторга. Прошёл 3 раза, рекомендую изумительная игра.
bug+不能随时存档，导致玩了很长时间的进度只能放弃，强行退出
[spoiler]卧槽！最后竟然活活被扳手给打死了？[/spoiler]能再虐点么，看在编剧牛逼的情况下就不寄刀片了，但还是好致郁啊！没想到就那样，就就就那样。。。。还是推荐吧，毕竟画风人设剧情（除了虐了点），都是满分神作，不能就我一个人致郁好吗

生化奇兵，很好的阐述游戏是第九艺术这个说法
  画面的艺术性极强，（停不下来的F12）许多细节安排的很到位，人物特点鲜明，剧情也是值得令人深思。
  作为一只动画狗，极力推荐！
  [spoiler] 玩这个游戏之前，要有时间悖论的概念，不然会看不懂剧情，如果看过《前目的地》就很好理解，一个人就是一场戏。	[/spoiler]
 伊丽莎白是真女神（救我无数，我的一半的命是她给的╮(╯▽╰)╭ 。 ）

장점
-게임이 종합예술이라는 말을 증명해주는 좋은 예시 즉 영화한편을 보는 느낌도 있고, 그 영화의 주인공이 되어 현장감을 완벽히 느낄 수 있다
-FPS장르에 실력이 좋지 않아도 원활하게 플레이 가능
-플레이 도중에 들리는 사운드트랙이 정말 좋다
-성우들의 연기가 일품

단점
-3-4시간 하다보면 멀미 때문에 머리아플수도 있음
-스토리가 전체적으로 까다로움
-복선이 너무 많아서 모든 컨텐츠를 즐기기에는 블로그나 다른 글을 참고해야함
-간혹 잔인 혹은 고어하다고 느끼는 사람이 있을 수 있음

결론: 띵작
Игра просто Космос!

[h1] Quick Note [/h1]
I would like to start this off with saying I bought Bioshock: The Collection during the summer sale for only $15 (This conatins EVERYTHING, The games as well as the remastered versions of 1 & 2, and even all the DLC!) I Played through the main storyline on easy in just under 14 hours. Burial at Sea Ep 1 was done at about the 15.5-16 hour mark. I just finished Burial at Sea Ep 2 with a total of 22+ hours. I have only played Bioshock Infinite and none of the ther Bioshocks (yet.) I watched a playthrough of each game and their DLC on Youtube sometime in 2016. [u] 4.9/5 Stars [/u]
 

[h1] Main Storyline [/h1]
[b] Playthrough Style: [/b] Aggressive, Loot Bug
[b] Play time: [/b] ~14 Hours
[b] Difficulty: [/b] Easy

The gameplay of Bioshock Infinite was fantastic! The controls are well placed and easy to use (SIDE NOTE: I utilized the additional buttons on my mouse for melee and aiming.) The storyline is very full 97% of the time, there are a few times it got (at least it felt) off course at times but the greatness of the rest of the story counteracted that. This was my first experience with a semi-recent story driven game, my previous being Portal 2. It was a very pleasing flow of events and movement, to just get to run around and hop from sky hook to sky hook blasting, shooting, and bashing enemies was the thrill and adventure I expected. The graphics are very well done and on par with if not better than most graphics from 2013. A very bright and open game compared to the previous Bioshocks. With my GTX 750Ti I can run the game on the highest graphic settings with no visible issues. The music and sounds will normally make or break a game for me. The music is fantastic, honestly amazing. Gotta love 1912. Needless to say Bioshock Infinite has become my all time favorite video game.


[h1] Burial at Sea: Episode 1 [/h1]
[b] Playthrough Style: [/b] Semi-Aggressive (Leaning towards the aggressive side), Loot Bug
[b] Play time: [/b] ~2 Hours
[b] Difficulty: [/b] Easy
 
Back in Rapture, Pre-Sh*t Show too! Just amazing. Beautifully created and imagined, you get to spend some time in Rapture prior to the first game. Much like the main game, BaS:E1 just exceeds expectations in gameplay and graphics. Pretty much the same controls as the main game you can feel right at home while wandering around or fighting baddies. A big contrast would be the dark dinginess, once you get into Fontaine's, definitely a bit more spooky than previous. As this wasn't the longest playthrough there honestly isn't too much else to say about Burial at Sea: Episode 1.


[h1] Burial at Sea: Episode 2 [/h1]
[b] Playthrough Style: [/b] Non-Lethal (kill Count: 0), Loot Bug
[b] Play time: [/b] ~6 Hours
[b] Difficulty: [/b] Easy

Wow... That's all I'll say about the ending of BaS:E1. I feel... I feel... different, more like.. a woman... WHAT?!?!? I'M ELIZABETH!!?!?!?! That's new! We are now playing as Elizabeth. But that isn't the only new thing. New mechanics have been introduced to the game. Like the 1998 Mode, similar to 1999 Mode but it forces you to play a non-Lethal on top of the 1999 Mode difficulty. Stealth, Stealth is the new name of the game, at least my playthrough was. Enemies now have visible and a new sense of awareness from the main game. Sneaking around avoiding things that make noise such at broken glass and puddles of water (and other liquids) definitely adds to the feel of playing as someone like Elizabeth. You are given a new (to Bioshock Infinite) weapon to use, a crossbow, which fires non-lethal bolts like the tranquilizer bolt, the noise-maker bolt, and the Gas Bolt. You get to crawl around in airvents to escape enimies and even find secret rooms! The graphics still continue to shine as you run around the the underwater prison. The storyline for this is just filled to the brim and ready to be played over and over again. My biggest complaint (a small one at that) is that it feels like too much of just running in circles around the map going into each building a few times.


[h1] Overview [/h1]

Do I recommend this game? Uhhhh... YEAH! More than anything!

If you are seriously contemplating getting this game like I was for about a year, GET IT! It is worth every penny and I look forward to playing it for many more hours to come.
Thanks for reading my whole review!

Edit: "Deserves to be nominated for every Steam Award but I could only do one... Mom's Spaghetti will suffice."

Un juego el cual obligatoriamente  causará que tu reacción al completarlo y comprender su maravillosa historia sea de asombro, dado la extrema calidad de la misma, pero que luego de varias veces de jugarlo se torna algo monótono completarlo. Buen diseño de personajes, quizá demasiados modelos y animaciones de humanos iguales durante todo el juego, pero que no notas a simple vista. Vale totalmente la pena, si te interesan los FPS y buscas algo diferente, intenta con esta saga.
Amazing game, but man the ending was tRiPpy

A beautifully crafted world with fantastic atmosphere and gorgeous visuals, coupled with top quality audio and voice work. The gameplay was also fun and enjoyable, with a wide variety of weapons to choose from. The story was a little confusing but interesting and you're unlikely to guess what happens. Overall a solid package.

one word. mindfuck.
我刚玩的时候只是觉得画风很有特点，有一种迪士尼动画的感觉，一路看看风景感觉也还不错，后来的战斗部分感觉一般，可探索的区域很少，全程一条线的感觉，当时感觉这游戏没有网上吹的那么神，直到我遇见了伊丽莎白……刚开始 只是隔着观察窗看，当我们第一次见面时她像一只受了惊吓的兔子，用一本厚厚的书想我砸过来，后来又温柔的问我有没有受伤时，我只感觉，天使——降临了……

太血腥了，而且无法像其他游戏那样在设置里关掉。
其他都很好

Let me start by saying that I think negative reviews of [i]Bioshock: Infinite[/i] fall into two catagories: A) Players who have a technical issue and cannot play the game & B) refuseniks who are simply reacting to the game's popularity. [i]Infinite[/i] is a beautiful, touching and astoundingly written game. It is one of only three games that have actual elicted such an emotional response that they made me weep, the other two being my first playthrough of [i]FFVII[/i] and [i]Okami[/i]. [i]Infinite[/i] makes you attached to the characters to a degree that is lacking in ANY form of media and, for a game with primarily story-based appeal, offers a surprising amount of replay value simply because one wishes to experience the story and the feelings again. The attention to detail, the little musical references to future eras, the beautiful break in the middle where Booker plays the guitar and Elizabeth sings, all of these just serve to deepen the immersion and your feelings for the characters. Hell, just take Booker: he has more depth to his character than any other protagonist of an FPS I've ever played.
Просто....офигенно...
최고의 명작! 근데 엔딩보고 스토리 정리 보시는걸 추천드립니다.
剧情有bug，但是绝对惊艳，玩到结尾让你惊讶

关键字：蒸汽朋克、超能力、平行时空、轮回、救赎
因为蒸汽朋克风格和剧情冒险向入手了这款游戏，从收集要素和战斗方式来看同羞辱十分相似，但是生化奇兵无限的剧情更加惊艳。
游戏开始男主坐船进入塔顶并升天进入天空之城，然后进入一个地下教堂，其中男主问一个牧师我在哪里，牧师答道“天堂”，第一个伏笔就此埋下，从某种意义上来讲，男主确实已经进入了天堂，救赎之路的轮回，游戏最后男主伊丽莎白让男主选择一个塔进入，打开一个新的平行世界，至此，游戏首尾呼应，一个完整的轮回，颇有震撼感。从剧情中无数个伊丽莎白的分身和平行世界看出，游戏的名字《生化奇兵：无限》指的是无限个可能、无限个平行时间，无限的轮回。这里不得不让人想起了《恐怖游轮》和《蝴蝶效应》等电影的世界观。
游戏中男主布克在另一个世界中是大魔王，其实都是男主自己。时空之间相互干涉发生了很多不可预料的后果，很多事情你越是想去修正它，他便越发的远离你的初衷。DLC海葬二部曲进一步升华了游戏剧情，悲剧的结局让人遗憾落泪。
游戏中的电影播放器中的视频也有许多反乌托邦价值观的传递。

通关撒花！

先给制作方献上我新鲜的膝盖~这剧情、这脑洞、这画风，实在是太！棒！啦！
第一次走进高塔上的升降机，进入哥伦比亚城的那一瞬间，透过玻璃窗看着穿梭在云层中的天空之城，实在是太！震！撼！啦！

Tips: 绕路绕得一头雾水的我偶然发现按N会出现箭头指引任务方向！

为可爱的伊丽莎白而来

So I'll just get quickly into it.
Graphics are amazing, 
Story amazing.
Gameplay ~ meh
Story length. okay, finished in 2 days: 12 hours
But that story is full of action and always fun.
All the unequness of bioshock originals, just... higher.

The slightly longer review:
Loved the story, as awesome and interesting as the original.
Some of the story seems to try to make it feel nonlinier, but the story is very lineir, though again, just to make it clear is awesome. Grahpics, amazing, love it. No matter where you look, the environment is immersive. some of the controls seems a bit clunky (this is me being nickpicky) though I loved the position the game puts you in sometimes, the challange is real. Okay, so not so long, but after playing, I would buy the game again.

Понять сюжет с первого раза не получилось. Пришлось гуглить толкование . Система энергетиков понравилась , они хоть и неравноценные , но зато разнообразные . Геймплей довольно скучный , сорри , но парочка сильных поворотов и неплохая стилистика в совокупности никак не нивелируют отвратительную стрельбу  и тотальный рандом  спавна патронов для оружия , немыслимо сильные противники ещё ничего , но крайне шаблонные диалоги , скучные персонажи и нелогичное поведение в тех или иных ситуациях просто заставляют кричать : "ЭТА ИГРА НИКАК НЕ СТОИТ 1000 РУБ)" , но я все же скажу что стоит . Сюжет действительно очень сильный а Колумбия очень  интересное место , в отличае от всех героев этой игры , играть в нее я бы скорей не советовал , чем советовал.

当问我什么是第九艺术 那我的答案肯定是生化奇兵系列。 宏大的叙事观，细腻的叙事，出乎意料的转折，深刻的哲学讨论，迷人的蒸汽朋克美学，酣畅淋漓的打斗以及魔法系统。因为steam版的闪退让我只能在ps4上一遍遍地重温这部经典之作，所以我每次都会再伊丽莎白跳舞的时候停下来，多欣赏一番。 “多么美好的瞬间呀。”

每次玩完的时候，我都有点无法接受这个结局，但是它又是我觉得最合理的结局。瞬间一种完成感涌上来，但是是一种丢失了完结感的完成感，随着海葬DLC的剧情深入与前作12代的剧情连接起来后，我更加觉得伊丽莎白身上的一种使命感让这个角色在我心中更加的宏大，从一开始眼睛里充满着好奇与天真的小女孩变成最后的眼睛里是忧郁和笃定的女士。这两种形象何尝不让人都迷恋呢。

或许，也再某一个平行时空下，还有一个伊丽莎白有机会在埃菲尔铁塔下听着La Vie En Rose吧。

伊丽莎白！

A story which somehow still manages to amaze me to this day.
Long story short. Buy it. That or miss out

Amazing game. The gunplay is a bit repetitive and can get boring at times, but the story is where this game truly shines. Absolutely recommend getting it with the DLC, as the main story will leave you wanting more, plus that sweet Bioshock 1 nostalgia. 

And yes, this game is a viable entry point into the Bioshock series, as you don't necessarily need to have played the first two games to understand anything in this one. 

Overall I give it a 9/10. Amazing experience.
